title: The Snow - Part 4
description: ***PART 4 IN THE SEQUEL TO THE RAIN***Russell has returned from the dead. And somehow, Ernest has survived, the bullet still lodged in his chest. But it seems that there is still one snow walker left. And the evidence of the radiation is too much to deny any longer. But there might just be a way out...Everyone has been beaten by the weather. Is there any way to survive the wastes? Find out in part 4 of The Snow.
author: Joseph A. Turkot
